name: @floating-ui/core
description: Positioning library for floating elements: tooltips, popovers, dropdowns, and more

scripts.declaration: tsc --build tsconfig.lib.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationMap && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dist = './dist'; if (fs.existsSync(path.join(dist, 'index.d.ts'))) fs.renameSync(path.join(dist, 'index.d.ts'), path.join(dist, 'floating-ui.core.d.ts')); if (fs.existsSync(path.join(dist, 'index.d.ts.map'))) fs.renameSync(path.join(dist, 'index.d.ts.map'), path.join(dist, 'floating-ui.core.d.ts.map')); if (fs.existsSync(path.join(dist, 'dom.d.ts'))) fs.renameSync(path.join(dist, 'dom.d.ts'), path.join(dist, 'floating-ui.core.browser.d.ts')); if (fs.existsSync(path.join(dist, 'dom.d.ts.map'))) fs.renameSync(path.join(dist, 'dom.d.ts.map'), path.join(dist, 'floating-ui.core.browser.d.ts.map'));"
scripts.build: pnpm build:only && pnpm clean:buildinfo && pnpm declaration

author: atomiks
